text: Dmitriy Vladimirovich Khamkin () (born 22 August 1985 in Chusovoy, Perm Krai) is a Russian luger who has competed since 2002. He competed in the men's doubles event at the 2006 Winter Olympics in Turin, but crashed during the first run and did not finish. Khamkin finished 16th in the men's doubles event at the 2006 FIL European Luge Championships in Winterberg, Germany. ==References== *2006 luge men's doubles results *FIL-Luge profile Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:People from Chusovoy Category:Lugers at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:Russian male lugers Category:Olympic lugers of Russia
title: Dmitry Khamkin
